channel.title: A.I. on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in A.I. on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: AI Isn’t Hollywood’s First Script Doctor. But It May Be Its Last
item.description: Invisible labor has long powered Hollywood, from blacklisted writers to uncredited directors. But the rise of AI threatens to erase authorship entirely.

item.title: AI Isn’t Hollywood’s First Script Doctor. But It May Be Its Last
item.description: Invisible labor has long powered Hollywood, from blacklisted writers to uncredited directors. But the rise of AI threatens to erase authorship entirely.

item.title: Rise of the Machines: Inside Hollywood’s AI Civil War
item.description: The technology is already transforming the industry — and could forever change the entertainment we consume. But the battle to contain it has just begun.
